29.20. [Hrabanus Maurus] Expositio super Hieremiam Prophetam.
Exposition | Jeremiah
Manuscripts:
1. Augsburg, Staats- und Stadtbibliothek 2o 36, f. 74ra-155va. saec. xii1. Books 13-20.
2. Avranches, Bibliothèque municipale 113, 1r-142r. saec. xii. Complete. (S)
3. Berlin, Staatsbibliothek zu Berlin – Preussischer Kulturbesitz Lat. Fol. 748 (Görres 50), f. 1r-89v. saec. xiii. Abbreviated version of Hrabanus with Lamentations first in MS.
4. Brussels, Bibliothèque Royale 235-237, f. 273r-278v. saec. xv. Books 1-XII=Jerome; epitome of Hrabanus for books XIII-XVII.
5.  Brussels, Bibliothèque Royale 5546 (V. der G. 1357), f. 1r-97v. saec. xii. Abbreviated version attributed to Bede.,
6. Cambridge, Mass., Harvard College, Houghton Library IMS Typ 200., f. 1r-208r. saec. xii; Pontigny ?; Phillipps 3726. saec. xiii1/4.  Complete. (S)
7. Cesena, Biblioteca Malestestiana D.IV.2, f. 95ra-181va. saec. xv mid. Books 13-20.
8. Cesena, Biblioteca Malestestiana D.XX.5, f.195ra-45ra. saec. xv2. Attributed to Jerome. Abbreviated form of Books 18-20 (Lamentations).
9. Douai, Bibliothèque Municipale 398, f. 125r-144r. saec. xv. Attributed to Bede. Abbreviated form of Books 18-20 (Lamentations).
10. Florence, Biblioteca Medicea Laurenziana Plut. 19,5, f. 121r-154v. saec. xv. Attributed to Jerome. Abbreviated form of Books 18-20 (Lamentations).
11. Florence, Biblioteca Medicea Laurenziana Plut. 15 dex. 4, pp. 89-113. saec. xiiiinc. Attributed to Jerome. Abbreviated form of Books 18-20 (Lamentations).
12 Florence, Biblioteca Medicea Laurenziana S. Marco 598, f. 1ra-29vb. saec. xii/xiii.. Attributed to Jerome. Abbreviated form of Books 18-20 (Lamentations).
13. Graz, Universiätsbibliothek 1046, f. 1r-78v. saec. xii. Attributed to Jerome. Abbreviated form of Books 18-20 (Lamentations).
14. Graz, Universiätsbibliothek 1055, f. 121-168v. saec. xiv2. Abbreviated form of Books 18-20 (Lamentations).
15. Graz, Universiätsbibliothek 1540, f. 89v-140r. saec. xiiiinc.. Attributed to Jerome. Abbreviated form of Books 18-20 (Lamentations).
16. Klosterneuberg, Reg. can. 214, f. 97r-127r. saec. xii. Attributed to Jerome. Abbreviated form of Books 18-20 (Lamentations).
17. London, British Library Add. 22820, 1r-208v. saec. x2; Cluny. Complete. (S)
18. Munich, Bayerische Staatsbibliothek Clm 4653, f. 133r-261v. saec. xii. Abbreviated form of Books 18-20 (Lamentations)..
19 Munich, Bayerische Staatsbibliothek Clm 6223, f. 2r-137r. saec. ix. Contains glosses drawn from Hrabanus’ work.
20. Rome, Biblioteca Nazionale Centrale 1473 (Sess. 44), f. 116r-144v. saec. xi2; O: Nonantola; P: S. Croce in Gerusalemme. Books XVIII-XX. Attributed to Jerome in MS. Abbreviated form of Books 18-20 (Lamentations).
21. Salzburg, Stiftsbibliothek St. Peter a.VII.7, f. 1r-63r. saec. xii. Attributed to Jerome in MS. Abbreviated form of Books 18-20 (Lamentations).
22. Salzburg, Stiftsbibliothek St. Peter a.VII.30 f. 47r-95v. saec. xii. Attributed to Jerome in MS. Abbreviated form of Books 18-20 (Lamentations).
23. Sankt. Gallen, Stiftsbibliothek 282, p. 1-206. saec. ix2. Books 13-20.
24. Tortosa, Archivio Capitular de la Catedral 61. saec. xiii inc.
25. Trier, Stadtbibliothek 114/1166 2o, f. 105r-139v. 1481-1501. Attributed to Jerome.  Abbreviated form of Books 18-20 (Lamentations).
26. Vatican, Biblioteca Apostolica lat. 520, f. 173r-187v. saec. xi. Abbreviated form of Books 18-20 (Lamentations).
27 Vatican, Biblioteca Apostolica Urb. lat. 50, f. 173r-187v. saec. xv. Abbreviated form of Books 18-20 (Lamentations).
28.. Vienna, Österreichische Nationalbibliothek 920, f. 90v-122v. saec. xiv. Attributed to Jerome. Abbreviated form of Books 18-20 (Lamentations).
29. Vienna, Österreichische Nationalbibliothek 4133, f. 99r-120v. saec. xv. Attributed to Jerome. Abbreviated form of Books 18-20 (Lamentations).
30. Wolfenbüttel, Herzog August Bibliothek 4116 (Weissenburg 32). saec. ix2. 108 ff. As marginal gloss.
31. Zwettl, Stiftsbibliothek 36, f. 96r-121r. 1180-1190. Attributed to Jerome. Abbreviated form of Books 18-20 (Lamentations).
Fragments:
1. Basel, Universtätsbibliothek O II 14. ca. 1100.
2. Cremona, Archivio di Stato, Fragm. Not., busta 13, numero 284, f. 2r-2v. saec. xii.
Bibliography:
1. Hablitzel, J.B., “Der Jeremias-Kommentar des Hrabanus Maurus,” Studien und Mitteilungen zur Geschichte des Benediktinerordens und seiner Zweige 40 (1920), 243-251).
2. Todaro, Maria Novella, “Il commento di Rabano Mauro a Geremia,” Studia medievali ser. 3, Anno 42 (2001), 41-119.
3. Gamberini, Roberto, “Il commento a Geremia e alle Lamentazioni di Rabano Mauro. Composizione, diffusione e fortuna immediata,” Studi Medievali 3e ser. Anno 52 (2011), 1-30.
